channel.title: Valve Women
channel.description:
As some of you may know, I’m a female. I play (more than any other) Valve games. In recent years Valve has included these strong female characters in their action games. Naturally, I like to play the female character except for in the Half Life series where it’s impossible. So, Alex in HL2 is the strong female personality in that game.
I’m just curious; out of Alex from Half Life 2, Zoey from Left 4 Dead, Rochelle from Left 4 Dead 2, and Chell from Portal, who do guys find most interesting? Not in a romantic way. But which female character do you like and why? This is not a contest……..I’m just genuinely curious. :slight_smile:

item.title: Valve Women
item.dc:creator: Mented
item.description:
It’s a general symbol for good will and good luck or something. It used to be a common symbol used by sports teams. Quite wierd looking at netball teams all doned in swastikas. I’d love to start using it in its original way, but fear I’d be pelted on the streets with sharp objects.

@Topic: Tricky. I love zoey simply because my friend always used her online, so shes almost like the face I see when shes talking to me ( shes black too lol ).

As for characters on their own, has to be Alyx really. Haven’t really had that connection to a character since Meryll.

Read full topic

item.title: Valve Women
item.dc:creator: freundin88
item.description:
Kairouseki:

It’s a swastika. Swastika was around way before the Nazis and was and still is a symbol in Buddhism and Hinduism.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Swastika

Yeah, you know I just saw something about that, this week, on National Geographic. It goes back to the Hindus and Buddhist and it’s the symbol for unity or peace or something like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Valve Women
item.dc:creator: freundin88
item.description:
DODcrazy:

I’m gonna have to go with Alyx, she is the most real out of any of the characters. Chell should have spoken etc. because I think they should have left Gordon Freeman as the one and only silent character. Zoey is cool and I think she’s pretty real too, and Rochelle is just kinda bland, but so are all the rest of the l4d2 characters compared to the first one. Alyx reacts to situations they way I think a lot of girls would. She’s very strong spirited of course and is still able to maintain herself but the fact that she has those moments where she just shuts down is critical for her as a character.

I have to agree about Alyx. For a “bot” (sorry, but that’s the only word I could think of) when’s she’s there, she helps out more than another character.

Read full topic

item.title: Valve Women
item.dc:creator: gabefett
item.description:
P0lop1e:

Personally I prefer Zoey.
Alyx is fun, but she’s too… euh… womanised? She keeps on weeping and crying over everything. Ep:1 she “has to take a rest” cause the half dead man tried to eat her.
Chell you unfortunately don’t get to know as a person due to the game play.
Rochelle is just annoying. I had to change her with a Zoey replacement mod cause i couldn’t stand the voice and her way of acting. And no i’m not racist! but i find her annoying.
Why Zoey? A teen-age rebel fun girl who can shoot!
Yeah… .that’s the main reason… i can make her shoot like a real person.

she needed to take a rest because she just survived a train crash, dumbass

Read full topic

item.title: Valve Women
item.dc:creator: lambda
item.description:
JerseyRyan:

Jade from “Beyond Good and Evil” is probably my favourite. She has a very decisive and strong character, she also got some nice, sporty moves to underline her spontaneous appearance. Also, she has a pretty nose.

We’re talking about VALVe here :3

Anyways, my VALVe-favourite’s gotta be Zoey, I love the horror movie references.

Read full topic

item.title: Valve Women
item.dc:creator: freundin88
item.description:
Rosie:

of course of the two threads i pick the wrong one -_- le-sigh, anyway

Alyx and Zoey are my two favorite

i like Chell, but at the same time valve doesnt really develop her in any way so you could play through all of both portal games as a completely different person and you wouldn’t have to change anything in game to make it work.

Rochelle… i dont know… for some reason i’m just not a fan (maybe cause she’s gotten the last shot off of too many chargers or jockys that i was about to kill but that doesnt really have anything to do with the personality or character development)

Sorry about that Rosie, for some reason my computer (here at work - use it during lunch break) sat for about 2 minutes - I just got out of the site and went back and tried again and it went right away. Figures, the first post I make and it’s a screw-up.
Anyway, Alyx (my kid sister’s nickname is Alex) is my favorite but I like being all of them. I know a lot of people don’t like Rochelle, but I like her moxie. And you’re right; the character is only as good as the gamer at the controls.

Read full topic

I personally didn’t mind her

Zoey is my favorite. Alyx was at first, but then she went “aaalmooost thhereee” when close to a saferoom. That was the point the scale filled to the max.
